# Create a new conda environment named 'pygame_demos'
# This script sets up a conda environment with Python 3.8 and Pygame installed.

# Create the conda environment
conda create -n pygame_demos --channel conda-forge python=3.8 pygame

# Activate the new conda environment
# REM conda activate pygame_demos

# To activate this environment, use
conda activate pygame_demos

# To deactivate an active environment, use
conda deactivate

# Generated by Nicole LeGuern
